long_description: The Reflective Utility Cord kit from MSR is ideal for hanging food and guying tarps. Kit includes 4 CamRing(TM) cord tensioners and 49.2 ft. of highly reflective 3 mm nylon cord. Highly visible cord minimizes tripping and aids in locating gear.
short_description: The Reflective Utility Cord kit from MSR is ideal for hanging food and guying tarps. Kit includes 4 CamRing(TM) cord tensioners and 49.2 ft. of highly reflective 3 mm nylon cord.
